PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-07912008-04-18152008LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActAn Act to amend the Canada Labour Code, the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act, the Canada Student Loans Act and the Public Service Employment Act
SubjectReservist Legislation
PrecisOrder fixing April 18, 2008 as the day on which sections 1 and 6 of AN ACT TO AMEND the CANADA LABOUR CODE, the CANADA STUDENT FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ACT, the CANADA STUDENT LOANS ACT and the PUBLIC SERVICE EMPLOYMENT Act (so-called Reservist Legislation) come into force.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0042 Publication Date: 2008-04-30
AttachmentsAttachment
